```{r}
library('ggplot2')

nFrame <- readRDS('nResFrame.RData')

ggplot(data=nFrame,aes(x=noiseLevel,y=test.auc,color=model)) +
  geom_point() + geom_smooth()

ggplot(data=nFrame,aes(x=noiseLevel,y=test.ndeviance,color=model)) +
  geom_point() + geom_smooth()
```
